com.yahoo.bullet.storm.drpc

Class DRPCQuerySubscriber

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yahoo.bullet.pubsub.BufferingSubscriber
      • com.yahoo.bullet.storm.drpc.DRPCQuerySubscriber
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.yahoo.bullet.pubsub.Subscriber, AutoCloseable

    public class DRPCQuerySubscriber
extends com.yahoo.bullet.pubsub.BufferingSubscriber
    This class wraps a DRPCSpout and uses it to read messages from Storm DRPC. It needs all the Storm config to be able to connect to and read from the DRPC servers using Thrift. It buffers read queries in memory upto a specified limit (and stops till further commits are received) and can re-emit failed queries. However, it is not resilient if the Subscriber is closed or reinitialized elsewhere.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DRPCQuerySubscriber

        public DRPCQuerySubscriber(com.yahoo.bullet.common.BulletConfig config,
                           int maxUnCommittedQueries)
        Creates and initializes a Subscriber that reads from the DRPC servers. Intended to be used inside a Storm spout in a Storm topology.
        Parameters:
        config - The config containing the String function in DRPCConfig.DRPC_FUNCTION, the Storm configuration Map as BulletStormConfig.STORM_CONFIG and the Storm TopologyContext as BulletStormConfig.STORM_CONTEXT.
        maxUnCommittedQueries - The maximum number of queries that can be read without committing them.
